TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NextPreviousPagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示一个字段，该字段显示 控件中使用户能够分页浏览数据的导航控件。

span.span: Represents a field that displays navigation controls in a control enable users to page through data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一个字段，该字段显示控件中的导航控件 。The class represents a field that displays navigation controls in a control. 这些导航控件可用于对实现接口的控件 （如控件）显示的数据进行分页 。These navigation controls can be used to page through data that are displayed by a control that implements the interface, such as the control. 类提供使用户可以一次在页面上浏览数据的按钮，或跳转到第一个或最后一个数据页。The class provides buttons that enable users to navigate through the pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data. 您可以 通过使用属性设置按钮的样式来自定义对象的外观 。You can customize the appearance of the object by using the property to set the style of the buttons. 你还可以使用 属性来选择所显示的按钮类型。You can also use the property to choose the type of button that is displayed. 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型Button type|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 可以 通过将属性设置为来隐藏控件中的对象 `false` 。You can hide a object in a control by setting the property to `false`. 还可以通过将 、 、 和 属性设置为来 `false` 隐藏 (第一页、上一页、下一页和最后一页按钮) 的单个按钮。You can also hide the individual buttons (the first-page, previous-page, next-page, and last-page buttons) by setting the , , , and properties to `false`. 控件使您可以使用 、 、 和属性为每个按钮指定自定义文本 。The control enables you to specify custom text for each button by using the , , , and properties. 当 属性设置为时 `ButtonType.Image` ，必须提供将为该按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must provide the URL to an image that will be displayed for the button. 通过设置 、、 和属性，可以为每个按钮单独设置图像 。You can set images individually for each button by setting the , , , and properties. 当 属性设置为时 `ButtonType.Image` ，相应的文本属性将充当图像的替换文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，属性指定的文本 将显示为第一页图像按钮的替换文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the first-page image button. 在支持工具提示的浏览器中，此文本还会显示为工具提示。In browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 对象对控件中显示的数据进行分页 。The following example shows how to use a object to page through data that is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常在向动态创建的控件添加字段时使用 。This constructor is typically used when you are adding fields to a dynamically created control. 若要将 对象动态添加到 控件，请创建新的 对象，设置其属性，然后将其添加到控件的字段集合 。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数将对象动态添加 到 控件。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在浏览器上呈现页导航字段的按钮的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to render the buttons of the pager field on the browser.

value.span: 用于在客户端上呈现页导航字段的按钮的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class used to render the buttons of the pager field on the client.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在浏览器上呈现的用于页导航字段的按钮的 CSS 类。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the browser for the buttons of the pager field. 无论浏览器是什么，此属性都将始终呈现为类属性。This property will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 在不支持 CSS 的浏览器中，设置 属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定控件对象中的按钮的 CSS 类 。The following example shows how to use the property to specify a CSS class for buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定按钮字段中显示的按钮类型。Use the property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field. 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型值Button type value|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 如果 将设置为 `ButtonType.Image` ，则必须使用下表中显示的属性为按钮设置要显示的图像。When is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must set the image to display for the buttons by using the properties shown in the following table. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||为最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定图像按钮显示在 控件的对象中 。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that image buttons are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

member this.FirstPageImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为， `ButtonType.Image` 并且 属性设置为 `true` ，则使用 属性指定为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button. 此图像可以是在浏览器支持的任何文件格式 ( .jpg、.gif、.bmp 等) 。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值，则 `ButtonType.Image` 设置属性将 不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为控件的对象中的第一页按钮显示图像 。The following example shows how to use the property to display an image for the first-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认为“First”。

span.span: The default is "First".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，使用 属性指定要为第一页按钮显示的文本。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the first-page button. 当 属性设置为时 `ButtonType.Image` ，将显示图像，并且属性将 充当图像的替换文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还会显示为工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中，它可以通过使用设计器工具自动保存到资源文件中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性自定义控件中页导航字段的第一页按钮的文本 。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the first-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void HandleEvent(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub HandleEvent (e As CommandEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 处理 控件中发生的事件并执行适当的操作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the control and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是方法使用的帮助器方法 。The method is a helper method that is used by the method. 当单击控件内的其中一个按钮时，将调用它来处理在对象中发生的事件。It is called to handle events that occur in the object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked. 方法检查 参数中包含的对象的属性 `e` ，然后执行相应的操作。The method examines the property of the object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action. 下表列出了控件提供的按钮 以及单击按钮时执行的操作。The following table lists the buttons that are provided by the control and the action that is performed when the button is clicked. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|操作Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |首页First page||导航到数据的第一页。Navigates to the first page of data.| |上一页Previous page||导航到上一页数据。Navigates to the previous page of data.| |下一页Next page||导航至下一页数据。Navigates to the next page of data.| |最后一页Last page||导航至最后一个数据页。Navigates to the last page of data.|

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

value.span: 默认为“Last”。

span.span: The default is "Last".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，使用 属性指定要为最后一页按钮显示的文本。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the last-page button. 当 属性设置为时 `ButtonType.Image` ，将显示图像，并且属性将 充当图像的替换文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还会显示为工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中，它可以通过使用设计器工具自动保存到资源文件中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性自定义控件中页导航字段的最后一页按钮的文本 。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the last-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NextPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NextPageImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中的下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 为 对象中的下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为， `ButtonType.Image` 并且 属性设置为 `true` ，则使用 属性指定为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the next-page button. 此图像可以是在浏览器支持的任何文件格式 ( .jpg、.gif、.bmp 等) 。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值，则 `ButtonType.Image` 设置属性将 不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为控件的对象中的下一页按钮显示图像 。The following example shows how to use the property to display an image for the next-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

member this.RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示禁用的按钮是否由 对象呈现为 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether disabled buttons are rendered as controls by the object.

value.span: 如果禁用的按钮呈现为 控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if disabled buttons are rendered as controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定禁用的按钮是否作为 控件由 对象呈现。Use the property to specify whether disabled buttons are rendered as controls by the object. 当无法执行与该按钮关联的函数时，对象将禁用这些按钮。The buttons are disabled by the object when the function associated with the button cannot be performed. 例如，在第一页数据中时，将禁用第一页和上一页按钮。For example, when you are in the first page of data, the first-page and previous-page buttons are disabled. 默认情况下， 对象通过使用属性指定的控件类型呈现禁用的按钮 。By default, the object renders the disabled buttons by using the control type specified by the property. 它还将 控件的属性设置为 `false` 。It also sets the property of the control to `false`. 当 设置为时 `true` ， 对象使用 控件来呈现禁用的按钮。When is set to `true`, the object uses the control to render the disabled buttons. 属性的值 用于设置 控件的属性 。The value of the property is used to set the property of the control. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在控件之间呈现非换行空格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls.

value.span: 如果在控件之间呈现非换行空格，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定在 ` ` 对象的导航控件之间是否呈现 HTML 字符) (不换行空格 。Use the property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character) are rendered between the navigation controls of the object. `false` 如果需要更好地控制通过级联样式表 (CSS) 类创建的布局，则可以将设置为。You can set to `false` if you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示第一页按钮是否显示在 对象中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the first-page button is displayed in a object.

value.span: 如果第一页按钮显示在 对象中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the first-page button is displayed in a object; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可显示或隐藏对象的第一页按钮 。Use the property to show or hide the first-page button of a object. 若要显示第一页按钮，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To show the first-page button, set the property to `true`. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定应显示第一页按钮。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that the first-page button should be displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]
